desc: Give empty glass pots a second life for crafting, storage and more. Available in 4-packs, plastic lids are custom made to fit Oui by Yoplait pots.

layout.text: Give empty glass pots a second life for crafting, storage and more. Available in 4-packs, plastic lids are custom made to fit Oui by Yoplait glass pots and are available in blue or clear.
